ods-load-tasks.sql: insert into ods_od (account_number,disbursement_date,telephone,purpose,purpose_category,fund_source,principal_outstanding,interest_outstanding) select account_number,STR_TO_DATE(disbursement_date,"%d-%M-%Y"),telephone,purpose,purpose_category,fund_source,principal_outstanding,interest_outstanding from stage_od

datamarts.dm-schema: create table dm_purpose_wise_od (purpose_category varchar(99) not null,count integer not null,principal_outstanding decimal not null,interest_outstanding decimal not null)
datamarts.dm-sql: insert into dm_purpose_wise_od (purpose_category,count,principal_outstanding,interest_outstanding) select purpose_category,count(*),round(sum(principal_outstanding),2),round(sum(interest_outstanding),2) from ods_od group by purpose_category
